scripts.vibe: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const c=fs.readFileSync('.vibe/current.md','utf8'); const m=c.match(/# Current Ship: #(\\d+) - ([^\\n]+)/); const s=c.match(/\\*\\*Status\\*\\*: ([^\\n]+)/); const t=(c.match(/\\[x\\]/g)||[]).length; const tt=(c.match(/\\[ \\]/g)||[]).length+t; console.log('\\nğŸš¢ Ship #'+(m?m[1]:'?')+': '+(m?m[2]:'Unknown')+'\\nğŸ“Š Status: '+(s?s[1]:'Unknown')+'\\nâœ… Progress: '+t+'/'+tt+' tasks ('+Math.round(t/tt*100)+'%)\\n');"
scripts.vibe:help:
echo '
ğŸš¢ VIBESHIP COMMANDS

npm run vibe:new     - Start a new ship
npm run vibe:ship    - Run all checks
npm run vibe:metrics - Full metrics report
